products.name: Ancona Natural/Rustic Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Anconaguarantees an economical choice within our wide planked Rustic grade selection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its pale distressed color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of Matte Finish to create both a natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with light gloss and wire brushing treatments these floors boast an elegant texture while maintaining their sleek presentation.

products.name: Marmo European Oak Engineered Hardwood
products.description: Marmopromises an economical choice within our Character grade selection and is guaranteed to add a contemporary feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its light brown vintage color and style combination. This wood floor is finished with several layers of UV lacquer in order to achieve a special finish which provides leveling, protection, as well as a light sheen. These floors are lightly wire brushed to create the benefit of fine texture while still maintaining a smooth appearance and overall feel.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish

products.name: Unfinished 7-1/2″ European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Unfinished 7-1/2″swear layer is constructed from 4-millimeter solid European Oak hardwood and its core is comprised of two to nine-layer plywood. European Oak flooring is one of the most sought after hardwood choices in the US. All of these layers combined to result in a 5/8″(15mm) total plank thickness and each plank measuring to 7-1/2” in width.

products.name: Venezia Natural/Rustic Engineered Hardwood in Grey
products.description: Veneziaguarantees an economical choice within our rustic grade Maple. We are confident that this smooth surface selection will add a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic, natural Maple color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Lacquer to achieve excellent protection together with a satin sheen and is also smooth for the interest of elegant texture while maintaining a sleek presentation.
